title: 1970s/1980s Era Chevrolet Corvette Convertible
item_description:

Probate Court Estate Note: This vehicle is being sold on behalf of a probate estate. No active record on file with CA DMV. Bill of Sale, Statement of Facts, Death Certificate, and Probate Court Documents will be mailed approximately 1-2 weeks after auction removal. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Probate Court Sells this vehicle "as-is" with no active record on file with CA DMV. The Buyer agrees to purchase the vehicle "as-is" and agrees to repair and smog vehicle if vehicle is 1975 or newer. An "as-is" no-smog bill of sale must be signed by both the administrator of the probate estate and the buyer in an agreement to these stated terms. Buyer accepts they are fully responsible for all aspects of smog, repairs to smog, (if required), inspections, transfer, registration, taxes, and fees due to California DMV.
